projects.name: ShopClick
projects.description: ShopClick is an ambitious e-commerce web application designed to streamline online shopping. Leveraging a contemporary tech stack, it offers users a sophisticated shopping experience. It combines the power of Tailwind CSS for the frontend with Firebase for the backend to create a robust and user-friendly platform.
